mapper.sql: select A.id articleId, A.slug articleAlug, A.title articleTitle, A.description articleDescription, A.body articleBody, A.user_id articleUserId, A.created_at articleCreatedAt, A.updated_at articleUpdateAt, T.id tagId, T.name tagName from articles A left join article_tags AT on A.id = AT.article_id left join tags T on T.id = AT.tag_id
